Welcome to faspy_docs’s documentation!¶

Faspy (Financial App Series for Python) is a python package/library for valuation of financial instruments. Importing the library is as simple as:

import faspy

There are several modules within the library.

  • Interest Rate
    • Discount Curve
    • Fixed Income Instruments
  • Risk
    • Historical Returns
    • Volatilies and Correlations
    • Weighting and Mapping
